name: @duestel/icons

scripts.generate-icons: bun run scripts/pre-script.ts && bun run fix-icon-names && bunx @svgr/cli --typescript --ext tsx --index-template ./scripts/svgr-index.template.js --icon --out-dir src/icons icons
scripts.generate-and-modify-icons: bun run generate-icons && bun run scripts/modify-icons.ts && bun run generate-index

description: A collection of customizable SVG icons, optimized for modern web development with TypeScript support.
